DOC.detailed_description: Purpose To determine effect aerobic exercise stroke cardiorespiratory fitness , cardiovascular function , stroke risk factor , walk health-related quality life . This study also examine retention effect exercise program end . Methods A randomize control study design use . Sixty participant randomize participate one 2 treatment arm ( 6 month duration , 3 day / week , 1 hour / session ) : 1 . BALANCE AND FLEXIBILITY ( non-aerobic ) PROGRAM comprise individualized upper low body stretch , balance activity , yoga- Tai Chi-style class . 2 . AEROBIC PROGRAM comprise structure , progressive aerobic training program . Participants evaluate 3 time point - baseline ( 0 month ) , post-intervention ( 6 month ) follow ( 8 month ) - stroke risk factor , cardiorespiratory fitness , arterial stiffness , echocardiography measure , inflammatory biomarkers , ambulatory capacity health-related quality life .
